title: parAkElanayya rAma
sahitya:
parAkElanayya rAma parAtparA nIkinta


anupallavi

  dharAsutA ramaNa sakala carAcaradhara nIku


caraNam    parama bhaktitOnu nIdu smaraNa bhajana sEyalEdu 
parama durAcArulaina narulajErimaraciti ninnu 
caraNa janAdhAruDaina parama puruSa vAsudEva 
nirupama guNa nIrajAkSa varamulosagi brOvavayya
